net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource

Class ClassPathResourceLibraryHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.ClassPathResourceLibraryHelper

  • @Component(value="classPathResourceLibraryHelper")
public class ClassPathResourceLibraryHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for ClassPathResourceLibrary implementations.

    It is expected that ClassPathResourceLibrary implemenations will use the ClassPathResourceLibraryHelper in the getNDE() and getResource() methods.

    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • resolveDependancies

        public List<ClassPathResourceLibrary> resolveDependancies(Collection<? extends ClassPathResourceLibrary> list)
        Resolve dependencies in the argument. The result is a list of ClassPathResourceLibrary instances in dependency order. Duplicates in the source list will be removed.
        Parameters:
        list - the list of requested libraries.
        Returns:
        List.

      • resolveNDEDependencies

        Parameters:
        list - the list of NDEs.
        Returns:
        list of NDEs.
